### Plots

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

```{r, fig.retina=2}
plot_ex <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = disp, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3)
plot_ex
```

```{r}
plotly::ggplotly(plot_ex)
```
